channel.title: Develop on My Small Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Develop on My Small Hugo Site

item.title: Linux_1
item.description: ! command !! last command !$ last argument of last command !n the nth command history !num num is t the number of a command from historyresult !-n倒数第n条命令 /dev/null 空设备, /dev/null 是个只进不出的地方 2>&1 ###系统管理： df,du,top,free,ps,kill ###用户权限：chown,chgrp,groups 文本操作：awk,grep,sed,paste,cut,diff,wc,vi,join, uniq,head, tail,sort 文件操作：find, tree 十九题、解析hg38.tss 文件，统计每条染色体的基因个数。 cut -f2 hg38.tss| grep -o -E "chr[0-9]{1,2}|chr[a-zA-Z]{1,2}" | sort -n |uniq -c 二十题、解析hg38.tss 文件，统计NM和NR开头的数量，了解NM和NR开头的含义。NM, mRNA. NR, ncRNA. NP, Protein 将内容写入一个文件 cat > test.

item.title: Perl_mv_rename_file
item.description: #!/usr/bin/perl use warnings; use strict ; use File::Copy; .... move("rename_".$ARGV[0], $ARGV[0]); move($original_file, $new_file) or die "The move operation failed: $!"; copy($original_file, $new_file); copy($original_file, $new_file) or die "The copy operation failed: $!";
